title: Looking for an English speaking jungle/top laner
body: Hey guys, really what the title says. that's about it. I just want a good jungler or top laner that's in silver 2 or higher. Add me GasMaskAdc

replies.body: I'm currently D5 but I can help you with whatever you need! We can play normals tho {{champion:427}}

> [{quoted}](name=Apolitus,realm=LAS,application-id=z7ypWKrA,discussion-id=Ur7UVREh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-08-13T01:40:15.621+0000)
>
> te amo tio cali <3

{{champion:6}}  grasias joben{{champion:6}}
Here you have a main supp, just in case. Gold V on SoloQ as well as on Flex

I speak english really well. I just started playing league like a week ago. But i played dota 2 for 7 years. If you wanna play and hang out a bit, just give me a call. I have working microphone and im 22 years old.

Im learning to play all lanes, but i enjoy playing top and jungle. 

ID: Robett Glover 

PD: Game of thrones, yea i know.
Está preguntando para jugar rankeds man, o al menos eso se puede interpretar del mensaje {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Hey man i can speak english, currently im on gold 5, but i got a question for u, are you a smurf or something? or why are you playing on Las?.. i dont want to play some rankeds if you got a lot of ping, if you are living on a country that is inside of the sv i can help you{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I am jungle but I do not speak English. :(
